name: Ostensus Bill
description:
Ostensus Bill is a 2D Platformer where things may not be what they seem. 

I made 10 short levels for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 (Theme: It is not real). The enemies are the main mechanic but I ended up spending the most time working on my PlayerController... It ended up okay but lacking a few modern touches...  This is my first Game Jam and 2D Platformer, and I am participating solo.  Most of the Game Art and SFX were made by me this past week. Tileset, Background Image, and Music were all borrowed.

Let me know which level was the hardest or your favorite. (I have the most trouble with Level 7...)

Play in Full Screen!

Movement: A, D

Jump: Space

Select: Left-Click

Pause: Enter or Right-Click
